text: Nohomba muboolanga mbu Ibraheem nende ismaeil nende Is’haaq nende Yaqoob, nende olwibulo lwa Yaqoob bali Abayahudi noho Abakiristo? Boola “nenywe mumanyile muno nohomba Nyasaye? Ne niwina omubii oyo okhushilakhwo ulia ufisanga obuloli bwalinabwo khu – Nyasaye! Ne shikali mbu Nyasaye shalolanga kabakholanga tawe
